doc.after: A campaign poster from the 1900 United States presidential election for the incumbent William McKinley who would eventually win The poster shows McKinley standing on a gold coin representing the gold standard with support from soldiers businessmen farmers and professionals claiming to restore prosperity at home and victory abroad The election was a repeat of the 1896 election pitting McKinley against William Jennings Bryan
